definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: The torsos are hollow, with solid arms and legs.
sentences.chinese: 这些武士的躯干是空心的，而四肢是实心的。
约翰斯的大脑，史密斯的躯干。

sentences.english: The rest of her body-her torso and her head-respond by sinking a bit.
sentences.chinese: 她身体的其他部分如躯干和头部则相应地下沉一点。

sentences.english: As I got closer, I could make out a woman's bloody torso.
sentences.chinese: 走近后，我辨认出一个女人血淋淋的躯干。

sentences.english: The larger footprint yields a roomier rear seat and trunk.
sentences.chinese: 较大的足迹产生一个宽敞的后座和躯干。

sentences.english: Lift both your legs off the ground and move them as close to your prostrated torso aspossible.
sentences.chinese: 双腿离地，然后抬起双腿尽而可能得靠近躯干。

sentences.english: Torso stretches help you to cool down after a football off-season workout.
sentences.chinese: 躯干延伸帮你冷静下来后，一个足球淡季锻炼。

sentences.english: The Pteranodon had almost no tail and a small body.
sentences.chinese: 它们几乎没有尾巴，躯干很小。

sentences.english: An exposed concrete body with flagged surface forms the center of the house.
sentences.chinese: 一个暴露的带有铺石板的混凝土躯干是住宅的中心。

sentences.english: They also may have long legs, but shorter torsos .
sentences.chinese: 他们也可能有长长的腿，但较短的躯干。

sentences.english: Then inhale and lift the torso up by pulling the tailbone down and into the pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 然后吸气，通过拉尾椎骨进入盆骨的方式抬起躯干。

sentences.english: One location yielded Omo I, which includes part of a skull plus skeletal bones.
sentences.chinese: 出土的包括一些头骨和躯干骨的化石残片。

sentences.english: Inhale and lift through the top of the sternum to lengthen the front torso.
sentences.chinese: 吸气并提拉你的胸骨的上部来伸展前侧躯干。

sentences.english: Power is generated from the hips and torso.
sentences.chinese: 用髋部和躯干发力，用双肩还原为手臂追加速度。

sentences.english: With another exhalation, lean the torso forward from the groins over the right leg.
sentences.chinese: 随着另一个呼气，把躯干向前屈到右腿的上方。

definition: the four limbs of the body
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
